channel.title: Problems, could use some help.. Move this please

item.title: Problems, could use some help.. Move this please
item.dc:creator: @StonedC0D3r StonedC0D3r
item.description:
@StonedC0D3r wrote:

So i was adding Highscores and was about finished, didn’t get any errors in Eclipse. But now when i try to connect to the highscores on my website. It gives me this :
Parse error: syntax error, unexpected T_VARIABLE in /home/runeleak/public_html/highscores/index.php on line 352

This is line 352:
$row = $hiscores->listscores($_GET[‘table’], $_GET[‘from’]) or die (mysqli_error()) $number = 1;

Anyone ?

Read full topic
item.source: Problems, could use some help.. Move this please
